attributes.additional_details: So we can be free of AI brainrot
attributes.background: To ban AI brainrot in the contery because it is annoying and it it is all kids are talking talking about and it's is distracting kids education

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We don't know what would constitute "AI brainrot".

You may wish to sign the following:

Ban the use of AI for image, video and audio creation
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751635
